long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SNS Todo Tasks is a powerful Chrome extension that helps you stay organized and manage your tasks efficiently. With its simple and intuitive interface, you can easily create, track, and complete your to-do list right from your browser.

Key Features:

Create and Save Tasks: Write down your tasks with a title and description, and save them with a click of a button. Never forget an important task again!

Task List Overview: Get a quick overview of all your saved tasks by simply clicking on the extension icon. See the titles of your tasks and mark them as complete with a checkbox.

Edit and Delete Tasks: Easily edit the title and description of any task directly from the task list. Delete tasks that are no longer relevant or completed.

User-Friendly Interface: The extension provides a clean and user-friendly interface, allowing you to focus on your tasks without any distractions.

Visual Cues: When you mark a task as complete, the task title automatically gets a strikethrough effect, providing visual cues of your progress.

Stay organized, prioritize your tasks, and boost your productivity with Todo Tasks Chrome extension. Never let important tasks slip through the cracks again!
